attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am led to beleive that there are 37 whole life prisoners in UK prisons deemed so dangerous that they should never be released.  the european court of human rights is debating whether a whole life tarrif is an infringement of these people's human rights.  If these people are released how many will re offend?  we the public deserve to be protected by the goverment we elected

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
